author: Special Correspondent
text:
Traders down shutters in Chennimalai, Perundurai, Vijayamangalam and Thingalur areas expressing solidarity with the fasting demonstrators at Avinashi demanding prompt implementation of Avinashi - Athikadavu water scheme.

There was substantial response from the trading community, local sources said.

Meanwhile, the Kongu Nadu Makkal Desiya Katchi called upon the Chief Minister and Ministers to address the concerns of the protestors without any time loss.

The health of the protestors on hunger-fast for the last 11 days has been deteriorating and in the event of any untoward incident, the Kongu region would turn restive, E.R. Easwaran, KMDK State Secretary said in a press release.

Pipeline

The farming community is already enraged over the determination of GAIL to lay pipeline through agricultural fields and the powerloom sector is in a crisis reflecting in lakhs of people going jobless and loss in earnings of several thousands of crores of rupees.

The otherwise peaceful Kongu region is showing signs of disturbance due to impediments to economic growth, Mr. Easwaran said.
title: Traders down shutters
